OOC: Back the train up! I dont remember hearing anything about this
history with Hot Rod and the dragons. If you plan to have characters
with backstory that involves another owned char, you must check with the
char's owner. This is because the two backstories will most likely
interfear with each other. I know I never had Hot Rod leading any dragon
Maximals. In fact in my backstory Hot Rod hadn't been seen since the
great upgrade, untill just before he came to NBW.
Please email me to discuss your history with Hot Rod. And yes, you must
get this checked out with me, its in the rules.
